Queries.Query: alter table agegendercontrol modify frequency numeric(15,5), modify tolerance numeric(15,5), modify minAge numeric(15,5), modify maxAge numeric(15,5);
alter table OC_PRESTATIONS add OC_PRESTATION_INVOICEGROUP varchar(50) null;
update OC_PRESTATIONS set OC_PRESTATION_INVOICEGROUP=OC_PRESTATION_REFTYPE where OC_PRESTATION_INVOICEGROUP is null and OC_PRESTATION_REFTYPE is not null;
alter table oc_insurarcredits modify column oc_insurarcredit_invoiceuid varchar(20);
alter table OC_DIAGNOSES add OC_DIAGNOSIS_SERVICEUID varchar(50) null;

update oc_diagnoses set oc_diagnosis_serviceuid=d.oc_encounter_serviceuid from oc_diagnoses a,@admin@..users b,@admin@..userparameters c,oc_encounters_view d where a.oc_diagnosis_updateuid=b.userid and b.userid=c.userid and b.userid<>4 and c.parameter='defaultserviceid' and (c.value is not null or c.value='') and d.oc_encounter_objectid=convert(int,replace(a.oc_diagnosis_encounteruid,'1.','')) and d.oc_encounter_serviceuid like c.value+'%' and (a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid is null or a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid='')

update oc_diagnoses a,@admin@.users b,@admin@.userparameters c,oc_encounters_view d set a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid=d.oc_encounter_serviceuid where a.oc_diagnosis_updateuid=b.userid and b.userid=c.userid and b.userid<>4 and c.parameter='defaultserviceid' and (c.value is not null or c.value='') and d.oc_encounter_objectid=cast(replace(a.oc_diagnosis_encounteruid,'1.','') as signed) and locate(c.value,d.oc_encounter_serviceuid)=1 and (a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid is null or a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid='')

update oc_diagnoses set oc_diagnosis_serviceuid=c.value from oc_diagnoses a,@admin@..users b,@admin@..userparameters c where a.oc_diagnosis_updateuid=b.userid and b.userid=c.userid and b.userid<>4 and c.value like 'CLI.%' and c.parameter='defaultserviceid' and (c.value is not null or c.value='') and (a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid is null or a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid='')

update oc_diagnoses a,@admin@.users b,@admin@.userparameters c set a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid=c.value where a.oc_diagnosis_updateuid=b.userid and b.userid=c.userid and b.userid<>4 and c.value like 'CLI.%' and c.parameter='defaultserviceid' and (c.value is not null or c.value='') and (a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid is null or a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid='')

update oc_diagnoses set oc_diagnosis_serviceuid=d.oc_encounter_serviceuid from oc_diagnoses a,oc_encounters_view d where d.oc_encounter_objectid=convert(int,replace(a.oc_diagnosis_encounteruid,'1.','')) and (a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid is null or a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid='')

update oc_diagnoses a,oc_encounters_view d set a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid=d.oc_encounter_serviceuid where d.oc_encounter_objectid=cast(replace(a.oc_diagnosis_encounteruid,'1.','') as signed) and (a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid is null or a.oc_diagnosis_serviceuid='')

insert into AccessLogs(userid,accesstime,accessid,accesscode) select updateuserid,updatetime,-personid,'M.'+convert(varchar(50),personid) from admin a where updateuserid is not null and updatetime is not null and not exists (select * from accesslogs where a.updateuserid=userid and accesscode='M.'+convert(varchar(50),personid))

insert into AccessLogs(userid,accesstime,accessid,accesscode) select updateuserid,updatetime,-personid,'M.'||convert(personid,char) from admin a where updateuserid is not null and updatetime is not null and not exists (select * from accesslogs where a.updateuserid=userid and accesscode='M.'||convert(personid,char))
update rwandazipcodes set district='RULINDO' where district='rurindo'
update OC_CONFIG set OC_VALUE=replace(convert(varchar(255),OC_VALUE),'globalhealthbarometer.org','globalhealthbarometer.net') where OC_VALUE like '%globalhealthbarometer.org%'
update OC_CONFIG set OC_VALUE=replace(OC_VALUE,'globalhealthbarometer.org','globalhealthbarometer.net') where OC_VALUE like '%globalhealthbarometer.org%'

create table doubledebets like oc_debets; insert into doubledebets(oc_debet_objectid) select oc_debet_objectid from (select count(*) total,oc_debet_objectid from oc_debets group by oc_debet_objectid having count(*)>1) b; update doubledebets a,oc_debets b set a.OC_DEBET_SERVERID=b.OC_DEBET_SERVERID, a.OC_DEBET_AMOUNT=b.OC_DEBET_AMOUNT, a.OC_DEBET_BALANCEUID=b.OC_DEBET_BALANCEUID, a.OC_DEBET_DATE=b.OC_DEBET_DATE, a.OC_DEBET_DESCRIPTION=b.OC_DEBET_DESCRIPTION, a.OC_DEBET_ENCOUNTERUID=b.OC_DEBET_ENCOUNTERUID, a.OC_DEBET_PRESTATIONUID=b.OC_DEBET_PRESTATIONUID, a.OC_DEBET_SUPPLIERTYPE=b.OC_DEBET_SUPPLIERTYPE, a.OC_DEBET_SUPPLIERUID=b.OC_DEBET_SUPPLIERUID, a.OC_DEBET_REFTYPE=b.OC_DEBET_REFTYPE, a.OC_DEBET_REFUID=b.OC_DEBET_REFUID, a.OC_DEBET_CREATETIME=b.OC_DEBET_CREATETIME, a.OC_DEBET_UPDATETIME=b.OC_DEBET_UPDATETIME, a.OC_DEBET_UPDATEUID=b.OC_DEBET_UPDATEUID, a.OC_DEBET_VERSION=b.OC_DEBET_VERSION, a.oc_debet_quantity=b.oc_debet_quantity, a.OC_DEBET_CREDITED=b.OC_DEBET_CREDITED, a.OC_DEBET_INSURANCEUID=b.OC_DEBET_INSURANCEUID, a.OC_DEBET_PATIENTINVOICEUID=b.OC_DEBET_PATIENTINVOICEUID, a.OC_DEBET_INSURARINVOICEUID=b.OC_DEBET_INSURARINVOICEUID, a.OC_DEBET_COMMENT=b.OC_DEBET_COMMENT, a.oc_debet_insuraramount=b.oc_debet_insuraramount, a.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARUID=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARUID, a.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARINVOICEUID=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARINVOICEUID, a.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARAMOUNT=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARAMOUNT, a.OC_DEBET_RENEWALINTERVAL=b.OC_DEBET_RENEWALINTERVAL, a.OC_DEBET_RENEWALDATE=b.OC_DEBET_RENEWALDATE, a.OC_DEBET_PERFORMERUID=b.OC_DEBET_PERFORMERUID, a.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARUID2=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARUID2, a.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARINVOICEUID2=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARINVOICEUID2, a.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARAMOUNT2=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARAMOUNT2, a.OC_DEBET_SERVICEUID=b.OC_DEBET_SERVICEUID where a.oc_debet_objectid=b.oc_debet_objectid; delete from oc_debets where oc_debet_objectid in (select oc_debet_objectid from doubledebets); insert into oc_debets select * from doubledebets; drop table doubledebets; drop index oc_debet_objectid on oc_debets; create unique index oc_debet_objectid on oc_debets(oc_debet_objectid);

select * into doubledebets from oc_debets where 1=0; insert into doubledebets(oc_debet_objectid) select oc_debet_objectid from (select count(*) total,oc_debet_objectid from oc_debets group by oc_debet_objectid having count(*)>1) b; update doubledebets set OC_DEBET_SERVERID=b.OC_DEBET_SERVERID, OC_DEBET_AMOUNT=b.OC_DEBET_AMOUNT, OC_DEBET_BALANCEUID=b.OC_DEBET_BALANCEUID, OC_DEBET_DATE=b.OC_DEBET_DATE, OC_DEBET_DESCRIPTION=b.OC_DEBET_DESCRIPTION, OC_DEBET_ENCOUNTERUID=b.OC_DEBET_ENCOUNTERUID, OC_DEBET_PRESTATIONUID=b.OC_DEBET_PRESTATIONUID, OC_DEBET_SUPPLIERTYPE=b.OC_DEBET_SUPPLIERTYPE, OC_DEBET_SUPPLIERUID=b.OC_DEBET_SUPPLIERUID, OC_DEBET_REFTYPE=b.OC_DEBET_REFTYPE, OC_DEBET_REFUID=b.OC_DEBET_REFUID, OC_DEBET_CREATETIME=b.OC_DEBET_CREATETIME, OC_DEBET_UPDATETIME=b.OC_DEBET_UPDATETIME, OC_DEBET_UPDATEUID=b.OC_DEBET_UPDATEUID, OC_DEBET_VERSION=b.OC_DEBET_VERSION, oc_debet_quantity=b.oc_debet_quantity, OC_DEBET_CREDITED=b.OC_DEBET_CREDITED, OC_DEBET_INSURANCEUID=b.OC_DEBET_INSURANCEUID, OC_DEBET_PATIENTINVOICEUID=b.OC_DEBET_PATIENTINVOICEUID, OC_DEBET_INSURARINVOICEUID=b.OC_DEBET_INSURARINVOICEUID, OC_DEBET_COMMENT=b.OC_DEBET_COMMENT, oc_debet_insuraramount=b.oc_debet_insuraramount, OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARUID=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARUID, OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARINVOICEUID=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARINVOICEUID, OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARAMOUNT=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARAMOUNT, OC_DEBET_RENEWALINTERVAL=b.OC_DEBET_RENEWALINTERVAL, OC_DEBET_RENEWALDATE=b.OC_DEBET_RENEWALDATE, OC_DEBET_PERFORMERUID=b.OC_DEBET_PERFORMERUID, OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARUID2=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARUID2, OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARINVOICEUID2=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARINVOICEUID2, OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARAMOUNT2=b.OC_DEBET_EXTRAINSURARAMOUNT2, OC_DEBET_SERVICEUID=b.OC_DEBET_SERVICEUID from doubledebets a, oc_debets b where a.oc_debet_objectid=b.oc_debet_objectid; delete from oc_debets where oc_debet_objectid in (select oc_debet_objectid from doubledebets); insert into oc_debets select * from doubledebets; drop table doubledebets; drop index oc_debet_objectid on oc_debets; create unique index oc_debet_objectid on oc_debets(oc_debet_objectid);

create table doubleadmins like admin; insert into doubleadmins(personid) select personid from (select count(*),personid from admin group by personid having count(*)>1) b; update doubleadmins a,admin b set a.immatold=b.immatold, a.immatnew=b.immatnew, a.candidate=b.candidate, a.lastname=b.lastname, a.firstname=b.firstname, a.gender=b.gender, a.dateofbirth=b.dateofbirth, a.comment=b.comment, a.sourceid=b.sourceid, a.language=b.language, a.engagement=b.engagement, a.pension=b.pension, a.statute=b.statute, a.claimant=b.claimant, a.searchname=b.searchname, a.claimant_expiration=b.claimant_expiration, a.updatetime=b.updatetime, a.native_country=b.native_country, a.native_town=b.native_town, a.motive_end_of_service=b.motive_end_of_service, a.startdate_inactivity=b.startdate_inactivity, a.enddate_inactivity=b.enddate_inactivity, a.code_inactivity=b.code_inactivity, a.update_status=b.update_status, a.person_type=b.person_type, a.situation_end_of_service=b.situation_end_of_service, a.updateuserid=b.updateuserid, a.comment1=b.comment1, a.comment2=b.comment2, a.comment3=b.comment3, a.comment4=b.comment4, a.comment5=b.comment5, a.natreg=b.natreg, a.middlename=b.middlename, a.begindate=b.begindate, a.enddate=b.enddate, a.updateserverid=b.updateserverid, a.archiveFileCode=b.archiveFileCode where a.personid=b.personid; delete from admin where personid in (select personid from doubleadmins); insert into admin select * from doubleadmins; drop table doubleadmins; drop index admin_personid on admin; create unique index admin_personid on admin(personid);

select * into doubleadmins from admin where 1=0; insert into doubleadmins(personid) select personid from (select count(*) total,personid from admin group by personid having count(*)>1) b; update doubleadmins set immatold=b.immatold, immatnew=b.immatnew, candidate=b.candidate, lastname=b.lastname, firstname=b.firstname, gender=b.gender, dateofbirth=b.dateofbirth, comment=b.comment, sourceid=b.sourceid, language=b.language, engagement=b.engagement, pension=b.pension, statute=b.statute, claimant=b.claimant, searchname=b.searchname, claimant_expiration=b.claimant_expiration, updatetime=b.updatetime, native_country=b.native_country, native_town=b.native_town, motive_end_of_service=b.motive_end_of_service, startdate_inactivity=b.startdate_inactivity, enddate_inactivity=b.enddate_inactivity, code_inactivity=b.code_inactivity, update_status=b.update_status, person_type=b.person_type, situation_end_of_service=b.situation_end_of_service, updateuserid=b.updateuserid, comment1=b.comment1, comment2=b.comment2, comment3=b.comment3, comment4=b.comment4, comment5=b.comment5, natreg=b.natreg, middlename=b.middlename, begindate=b.begindate, enddate=b.enddate, updateserverid=b.updateserverid, archiveFileCode=b.archiveFileCode from doubleadmins a,admin b where a.personid=b.personid; delete from admin where personid in (select personid from doubleadmins); insert into admin select * from doubleadmins; drop table doubleadmins; drop index admin_personid on admin; create unique index admin_personid on admin(personid);
